welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Zaventem, Belgium! This charming city is known for its rich history, delicious cuisine, and stunning architecture. We invite you to explore and experience all that Zaventem has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brussels Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Brussels Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network for up to 4 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport is a modern and efficient facility, with a variety of shops, restaurants, and services available for travelers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit or password required.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charleroi Brussels South Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Zoersel Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
